Introduction

Switch Berry (Korean: 스위치 베리) was a four-member girl group under DAM Entertainment. They debuted on July 19, 2013 with the digital single "Shaken". Switch Berry was originally announced as a sub-unit of the girl group Switch, but later they became the main group. The group's final line-up consisted of members: Jimin, Minah, Hana and Rose.

Current state:
